website_summaries.verdict: A soft and cozy comforter set with a bold pattern, perfect for spicing up your bedroom or dorm room.
pros: Set includes comforter, one pillow sham, and one pillowcase
Available in a range of bright colors
Constructed from a hypoallergenic material that’s soft and cozy
cons: Some complaints of the comforter being too thin, not ideal on cold nights

customer_reviews.title: NOT Machine washable
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed in this comforter. It was a Christmas present for my son. We loved the material and the colors. But unfortunately after the second wash, it completely fell apart in the washing machine. I even went back to the product description page to be sure that I read correctly that is was "Machine washable".
customer_reviews.author: Miranda rooks

customer_reviews.title: Looks good!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, this is the second time I bought this for my son( diffrent size)
customer_reviews.author: natalia

customer_reviews.title: Kid approved
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 9yr olds room. 2 hours after putting it on his bed he was under the cover and in a deep sleep. He’s a very happy camper. Fits as expected Color as pictured Soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great color, design, and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I bought this comforter set to redecorate my son's room. It looks just like the picture. He grew out of the Batman theme and I was looking for something that could last him several years without looking too juvenile. Plus, it's soft and doesn't seem to collect too much dog fur. The color combo even became the inspiration for the rest of his room!
customer_reviews.author: DTaylor

customer_reviews.title: Then I spent 2 nights sleeping in his bed when he was away and fell in love with the perfect weight of this comforter
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 18 yr old son who likes "techy looking" things and he really likes it. Then I spent 2 nights sleeping in his bed when he was away and fell in love with the perfect weight of this comforter! It feels airy, yet it is warm; it is warm, yet it seems to breathe. :) Slept SO soundly (house at 69 degrees those two nights).
customer_reviews.author: Shazam

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these for my boys. They are holding up well, the colors are vibrant, and it is soft. Being that my kids are still little, I have had to wash everything, and it handled it well. I am giving it 4 starts because of the size. If you are ordering for a twin bed and do not want a bed skirt, get a full size comforter set. The ends do not cover the box spring on my boys' beds. That being said, this is a a very nice set.
customer_reviews.author: Baker214

customer_reviews.title: will look beautiful
customer_reviews.text: for my daughter's college dorm. She loves it and is very excited. VERY IMPORTANT: The sheet sets (Kiwi and Aqua) that are paired with this comforter are NOT a perfect match. If that matters, do not buy them together. We are trying to exchange them for the white as shown in the picture
customer_reviews.author: Fezzik2

customer_reviews.title: Comforter
customer_reviews.text: I am using the comforters on our master bedroom XL twin beds. The design is great, but the material is slippery and we are having a hard time keeping them on the bed and not on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my son's room
customer_reviews.text: Comforter set is great. My son is picky when it comes to fabrics touching him. Comforter is soft and washes well.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Hale

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great comforter. It’s soft and great quality. Well worth the money. I would buy this again for sure, maybe in another color too!
customer_reviews.author: CLOUTS5

customer_reviews.title: Torn at the seams
customer_reviews.text: Torn after just a few months. Looks great, but seems should last longer than a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney E. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Blue Room
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is perfect in color if you want a true blue room. This is for my daughter's room and it is too blue for her. The colors are bright. The quality looked good but I didn't take it all the way out of the bag. I am returning because my daughter wants a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Charla Kremer

customer_reviews.title: Great look for the Dorm
customer_reviews.text: Bought to decorate my dorm room. Looks really cool and feels good. Not gotten to use it yet though.
customer_reviews.author: JLB

customer_reviews.title: We love this!
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is well made, and has fascinating details. The accent pillow that comes with this set is attractive and interesting. We have this set in red and it looks fantastic. I was worried the bold colors would be overstated, but the combination of colors with the gray in it is actually very nice. The feel of the fabric is soft and wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Save yourself
customer_reviews.text: Balls up inside after a wash...I didn't even bother trying to separate the cotton after the 3rd wash...I pitched it
customer_reviews.author: Birthday Party

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy Son
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son's room. Fits queen bed nicely. Looks amazing. Perfect color, he loves his room now
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great colors
customer_reviews.text: After burning through two themed rooms with my son, I decided no more theme rooms! Just when we have it decorated, he has moved onto a new love. I found this bedding and loved it. It looks just as pictured. He likes it and now we can keep it for longer than a few months!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Looks like the picture
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old son loves it. It is soft, but thin. Not sure how warm it will be in winter months. I hope it holds up. I don’t think the quality is there.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Comforter does not breathe and is more like a duvet construction
customer_reviews.text: Comforter does not breathe and is more like a duvet construction, the stuffing n cover are only attached in three places n not well stitched at all. Not returning but would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Patricia J Castelhano

customer_reviews.title: It looks just as shown in the pictures and I like it.
customer_reviews.text: It is good quality for the money and the colors are true to the picture.

customer_reviews.title: Fits the bill
customer_reviews.text: Just right for my boys' room. True to colors on screen.
customer_reviews.author: L. S.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my son for Christmas. He loved it
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome comforter set!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bed set. Perfect for my 11-year old boy. Not too heavy. Not too thin. Just right. True to colors. Would recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son. Quality is very nice for the price. Comforter is soft enough to sleep with.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Gamache

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute bedding. Brought this for my son and he LOVES it! I paired it with neon green sheets. Soft and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Great set! I got this for my teen and he loves the colors and the comfort. Very soft, fit bed perfectly. Easy to wash. Colors and vibrant. Painted his room grey and light blue and it was a perfect match. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Egan

customer_reviews.title: this set is not of good quality. I use it but would not buy ...
customer_reviews.text: Thought this looked very fashionable and matched well with the decor I have. However, this set is not of good quality. I use it but would not buy again if I needed a new comforter set.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy S.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quilt and value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Someone who loves comfort

customer_reviews.title: Adds Nice Decor
customer_reviews.text: Nicely transformed my son's room from from a little boy's room to a sleek big boy's room. If I had known this comforter would have done the job so easily, I would've ordered them a long time ago!
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that I got what i ordered. Description was as it shown.
customer_reviews.author: johana

customer_reviews.title: Good set for boys room
customer_reviews.text: Great set. Matched my sons room perfect. Colors were pretty true to what my computer screen showed. Great quality. Have washed several times and it's held up great.
customer_reviews.author: saras

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Ordered for my 5yr old son and it was perfect. He loved the picture and love it in person. Looks identical to picture.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the set. He can't wait to see it in his dorm room. He wanted something with color that wouldn't overwhelm and this set was perfect. It arrived very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Hollie G

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, and looks good
customer_reviews.text: Haven't even owned it a month yet and the stiching has failed. It is very warm, comfortable, and looks good, but is very poorly made. I fear washing it will tear it to pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick

customer_reviews.title: smaller than described
customer_reviews.text: literally a few inches smaller than said dimensions - not at all suitable for a queen bed if you expect it to look like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Feels nice, colors bright
customer_reviews.text: Feels nice, colors bright, although areas described as navy are black!! Makes it bad, because I bought navy drapes to go with it!! Has not been washed yet, so we’ll see..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft and nice looking!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the olive green/orange. It really is a dark olive green not dark gray like the picture. The colors are vibrant and it is a very soft comforter. It looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mumof3

customer_reviews.title: product cute but cheap...
customer_reviews.text: The pillow case was ripped when arrived😢 i really like this and don't want to have to return it but pretty bummed 😕 about it
customer_reviews.author: shantrice k.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy bed, happy daughter.....
customer_reviews.text: So soft, matched description, & made an 11 years new bedroom theme complete!
customer_reviews.author: ELENA R.

customer_reviews.title: Great bedding at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Great bedding at a reasonable price. Perfect for my 11 almost 12 yo sons room. He didn't want his Star Wars bedding on anymore, something more preteen. Great bedding for the price.
customer_reviews.author: B N.

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: made my kid very happy,, love the look and everything about it
customer_reviews.author: alyson weston

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the fabric itself was good. However
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the fabric itself was good. However, the greens and blues were not as bright or vibrant as depicted in the picture, so the comforter set looked dull and old. The 'white' part is actually a soft grey (I guess that may be a good way to describe it), and the navy part of it looked washed out. Quite disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: L. Rappallini

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bedroom set! Great colors and design, quality is Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Nice color. Have not taken out of package yet
customer_reviews.text: Nice color. Have not taken out of package yet, still trying to get settled in from a move across state. Will review better once I wash on put on my son's bed.

customer_reviews.text: I use this for my son twin bed look real good

customer_reviews.title: ... heavy based on the picture but the comforter is nice and airy while still keeping you warm at night

customer_reviews.text: Great buy for the money. Looks good and made well

customer_reviews.text: It looks just as good in person as it did on the computer. I was very happy with it! The material is super soft and it's a nice full comforter.

customer_reviews.title: Beware- the part that looks gray is beige. The ...
customer_reviews.text: Beware- the part that looks gray is beige. The piping is beige. The light green strip in the middle is more of a lime green. The colors were not what we were expecting so I returned it.

customer_reviews.title: easy to clean and very comfy
customer_reviews.text: my son loves the set. easy to clean and very comfy

customer_reviews.title: Great bedding.

customer_reviews.text: This is really cute for a boy's room. DO NOT buy this if you have a Queen bed. It will not be big enough. It would be OK if the bed is up against a wall on one side.... The pop of color is nice and the comforter is really soft.

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my son's college dorm. I like the material, but the comforter weight is fairly light. As other reviews have mentioned, the colors are not as shown. This is really a kaki color scheme. More muddy green and orange than the bright colors that are shown. My son loved it so I have no problems with the difference. I would recommend this product to others.

The quality of the comforter is nice. The fabric is soft and the details unique. We are both very happy with this selection. Shipping was fast.

We painted his walls black and gray and found a deep orange fabric to make curtains out of, and now his room looks great. The colors are as some others have mentioned.

customer_reviews.title: This is a really nice looking set
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice looking set, but the comforter seems kind of flimsy. It's not very full, or fluffy, if that makes sense. The fabric is soft though, and my son seems to like it.

product_meta.title: MI ZONE Pipeline Printed Comforter Set, Twin/Twin XL, Olive
product_meta.description: Size:Twin/Twin XL| Color:OliveThe Mi Zone Pipeline Comforter Set offers a fresh update to your room. The ultra-soft microfiber comforter boasts a striped pieced design in bold colors, for a casual look with an urban feel. Top stitching and twill tape details highlight the design, creating an eye-catching contrast. Coordinating sham(s) and one decorative pillow reiterate the comforter's design to complete the slick ensemble. Machine washable for easy care, this comforter set provides a fun and stylish update to your bedroom.
feature_bullets: Set includes: 1 comforter, 1 standard sham, 1 pillow
Measurements: 66-by-90-inch comforter, 20-by-26-inch standard sham, 10-by-18-inch Oblong pillow

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars160 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
